name: The Curing
description:
The Curing is a game all about competition. Whoever has the least amount of NPCs without your cure wins. Cure all of the infected before other players get to them first. 

Made for: Forge Jam IX - https://itch.io/jam/forge-jam-ix

Made by: Evan Kessman (T3kMast3r), Ben Wilcox (Ben880), and Adrian (BlackHavokk)
